name: Vegan Cauliflower Alfredo Sauce with Pasta
description: Super easy recipe for vegan cauliflower Alfredo sauce with pasta - deliciously creamy and healthy at the same time!
recipeIngredient: 8  oz  whole wheat tagliatelle (or pasta of your choice)
1/2  cup  oat milk (or unsweetened plant milk of your choice)

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the pasta according to the instructions on the package.

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the cauliflower into florerts and cook them in a large pot of salt water for about 8-10 minutes until they are very soft.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the peas for about 2-3 minutes. Set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the peas for about 2-3 minutes. Set aside.

recipeInstructions.text: Add oil into a skillet and sauté the garlic over low heat for 3-4 minutes until they are soft.
recipeInstructions.name: Add oil into a skillet and sauté the garlic over low heat for 3-4 minutes until they are soft.

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the cauliflower. In a food processor, combine the cauliflower, garlic, lemon juice, nutritional yeast, mustard, oat milk, vegetable broth, white wine, salt, and black pepper and process until smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the sauce into a skillet, add the margarine and simmer for 2-3 minutes.
